Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

InterleaveSet.description: This an interleave set for a memory chunk.
InterleaveSet.longDescription: This type shall describe an interleave set of which the memory chunk is a part.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Memory.description: Describes a memory device of the interleave set.
Memory.longDescription: This property shall contain the memory device to which these settings apply.

MemoryLevel.description: Level of the interleave set for multi-level tiered memory.
MemoryLevel.longDescription: This property shall contain the level of this interleave set for multi-level tiered memory.

OffsetMiB.description: Offset within the DIMM that corresponds to the start of this memory region, measured in mebibytes (MiB).
OffsetMiB.longDescription: This property shall contain the offset within the DIMM that corresponds to the start of this memory region, with units in MiB.

RegionId.longDescription: This property shall contain the DIMM region identifier.

SizeMiB.description: Size of this memory region measured in mebibytes (MiB).
SizeMiB.longDescription: This property shall contain the size of this memory region, with units in MiB.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoints.description: An array of links to the endpoints that connect to this memory chunk.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to the resources of type Endpoint with which this memory chunk is associated.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

MemoryChunks.description: The schema definition of a memory chunk and its configuration.
MemoryChunks.longDescription: This resource shall represent memory chunks and interleave sets in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AddressRangeOffsetMiB.description: Offset of the memory chunk in the address range in MiB.
AddressRangeOffsetMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the offset of the memory chunk in the address range in MiB.

AddressRangeType.description: Memory type of this memory chunk.
AddressRangeType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of memory chunk.

InterleaveSets.description: The interleave sets for the memory chunk.
InterleaveSets.longDescription: These properties shall represent the interleave sets for the memory chunk.  If not specified by the client during a create operation, the memory chunk shall be created across all available memory within the memory domain.

IsMirrorEnabled.description: An indication of whether memory mirroring is enabled for this memory chunk.
IsMirrorEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether memory mirroring is enabled for this memory chunk.

IsSpare.description: An indication of whether sparing is enabled for this memory chunk.
IsSpare.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether sparing is enabled for this memory chunk.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by or subordinate to this resource.

MemoryChunkSizeMiB.description: Size of the memory chunk measured in mebibytes (MiB).
MemoryChunkSizeMiB.longDescription: This property shall contain the size of the memory chunk in MiB.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #MemoryChunks.v1_3_3.MemoryChunks
